title: T20 International cricket
articleDescription: Australia vs India on Friday 31 October 2025 at the MCG
articleContent:
T20 International cricket returns to the MCG on October 31 when Australia takes on India in the second match of a five-match series.

The match will begin at 7.15pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey. 

If you use Journey Planner within 14 days of this event, you'll see all the extra services we've added to help you get there.
